articles.author: Lim Hui Jie
articles.title: Japan and Singapore miss GDP expectations; Asia markets rebound after Wednesday sell-off - CNBC
articles.description: Markets in the region clawed back some losses after mostly falling on Wednesday on the back of a hotter-than-expected U.S. inflation report.
articles.content:
The total value invested in bitcoin surpassed $1 trillion on Wednesday reaching an over two-year high following the debut of bitcoin exchange-traded funds in the United States last month.
